name: GetPlayerCameraPos
warnings: Player's camera positions are only updated once a second, unless aiming.It is recommended to set a 1 second timer if you wish to take action that relies on a player's camera position.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the position of the player's camera.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to get the camera position of.

params_body.name: Float:x
params_body.description: A float variable to store the X coordinate in, passed by reference.

params_body.name: Float:y
params_body.description: A float variable to store the Y coordinate in, passed by reference.

params_body.name: Float:z
params_body.description: A float variable to store the Z coordinate in, passed by reference.

return_values: The player's position is stored in the specified variables.
related_fn:
SetPlayerCameraPos: Set a player's camera position.
 GetPlayerCameraZoom: Get the zoom level of a player's camera.
 GetPlayerCameraAspectRatio: Get the aspect ratio of a player's camera.
 GetPlayerCameraMode: Get a player's camera mode.
 GetPlayerCameraFrontVector: Get the player's camera front vector
